about_the_game:
Original soundtrack for Heartbreak High: A Break-Up Simulator by Ronnie Dezsi. Includes 27 original tracks in uncompressed .WAV format.

TRACK LISTING:
00. Heartbreak High (Bonus Track)
01. Heartbreak High Main Theme
02. Name Enter
03. Hallway
04. Akane
05. Rebecca Burns
06. Kentaro Begs
07. Hall Monitor Masuka
08. Vihaan Is A Pro
09. Eleanor
10. Battle Eleanor
11. Eleanor's Fanfare
12. Rad Brad
13. Principal Hashmi
14. Yuri Is A Pushover
15. Morgan
16. Sports
17. Bad Timing Brandon
18. Clean Up Cliff
19. Scary Hallway
20. Your Lovers
21. Breakheart
22. End Credits
23. Love
24. You Louse
25. You Win
26. HB 1 (Bonus Track)
27. HB 2 (Bonus Track)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10 or above
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB vram
  • Storage: 625 MB available space

name: Heartbreak High - Original Soundtrack
